channel.title: CVE Feed for BUDDYBOSS DMCC -- BuddyBoss Theme
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BUDDYBOSS DMCC -- BuddyBoss Theme

item.title: CVE-2023-51477|2024-08-02T22:32:10.288Z -- buddyboss%20dmcc -- buddyboss%20theme
item.description: Improper Authentication vulnerability in BUDDYBOSS DMCC BuddyBoss Theme allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects BuddyBoss Theme: from n/a through 2.4.60.
